import { useReducer, useState } from 'react' import './MainForm.css' import PersonalInfo from './PersonalInfo' import Plan from './Plan' function Form() { function reducer(state, action) { switch (action.type) { case "nextpage": return {...state,page:state.page+1} default: return state } } const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, { page:0 }) function DisplayPage() { if (state.page === 0) { return } else if (state.page === 1) { return } } return (
  • 1

) } export default Form
